enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: In the SBSTA meeting on 30 October, Chair Dovland noted the recent workshop on P&Ms, suggested that in-depth discussions on this issue be deferred to SBSTA-16, and said he would produce draft conclusions. The conclusions were presented to SBSTA on 6 November.

Saudi Arabia, opposed by Poland, Switzerland, Central African Republic and Canada, advocated deleting the paragraph inviting Parties to consider and submit their views on the workshop, and on further action to advance work on P&Ms.
Following discussion, Dovland's proposed conclusions were approved and forwarded to the COP, which adopted them during its final Plenary on 10 November.
